Articles.Content:
Hi, Just to introduce myself.

Got playing KSP after it was mentioned on a minecraft thread (from a non-minecraft forum)

I have been playing KSP around a month, so far ive completed several orbits, 1 dock and have just started plans for my space station, next il be to the moon (mun) and beyond!

Browsing the forum, everyone seems knowledgeable and helpfull, ive hardly seen any critism or sarcasm like you might expect.

So, hi!
Welcome this is by far the nicest forum I've ever come across and if you do do something wrong they try to help unlike some just go full on caps lock rage.
Welcome Welcome! This is one of the finest and nicest forum I've come across also.
Of all the gaming communities I am a part of, this is by far one of the most helpful and friendly. Welcome to the game and the community, hope you stay awhile
